name: snapmoe
description: SnapMoe - 二次元图片收藏工具 - Cloudflare Worker + R2 + Supabase

scripts.setup: node -e "console.log('请使用 scripts/common/setup.sh 或 setup.bat')"

scripts.deploy:worker: node -e "console.log('请使用 scripts/worker/deploy.sh 或 deploy.bat')"
